metadata.title: CVE-2022-4138 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A Cross Site Request Forgery issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EEaffecting all versions before 15.6.7, all versions starting from 15.7before 15.7.6, and all versions starting from 15.8 before 15.8.1. Anattacker could take over a project if an Owner or Maintainer uploads a fileto a malicious project.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
